general.hero_heading: Build a professional, trustworthy storefront fast

general.feature_two_copy: Balanced spacing, legible typography, and elevated cards that feel premium not pushy.
general.feature_three_copy: Clear calls-to-action and trust signals that reduce friction during browsing.
general.stat_products_copy: Automotive to Apparel covered in one hub.
general.stat_support_copy: Quick help and proactive order updates.
